way..."},{"lineNumber":206853,"originalJapaneseLine":"　人間としての記憶が……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Could it be that the memories of being bad..."},{"lineNumber":206855,"originalJapaneseLine":"　思ったよりもよっぽど、魔王化が進行している」","translatedEnglishLine":"The demon king transformation is advancing much more than I thought.\""},{"lineNumber":206856,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ケッ、まずいことあるもんか」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Tch, there's nothing bad about that.\""},{"lineNumber":206857,"originalJapaneseLine":"「今日ここで、魔王とは決着をつけるだけだ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Today, here, we'll just settle things with the Demon <Yell>!\""},{"lineNumber":206859,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がははは、よく言った！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gahaha, well said!"},{"lineNumber":206860,"originalJapaneseLine":"　さすが俺達の弟だ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"As expected of our little brother!\""},{"lineNumber":206861,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ははっ、よく言った！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Haha, well said!"},{"lineNumber":206862,"originalJapaneseLine":"　さすが俺達の妹だ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"As expected of our little sister!\""},{"lineNumber":206863,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああ、勝つぞ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yeah, we’ll win!\""},{"lineNumber":206864,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うん……ありがとう、＜エール＞ちゃん」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yeah... thank you, <Yell>-chan.\""},{"lineNumber":206865,"originalJapaneseLine":"「君はとっても優しい子だね……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You’re a very kind girl...\""},{"lineNumber":206866,"originalJapaneseLine":"「行こう！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Let’s go!\""},{"lineNumber":206867,"originalJapaneseLine":"「質問にも答えられんか……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You can’t even answer my question...\""},{"lineNumber":206868,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ならば――","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Then—"},{"lineNumber":206869,"originalJapaneseLine":"もうよい」","translatedEnglishLine":"Enough.\""},{"lineNumber":206870,"originalJapaneseLine":"むき出しの殺意が、あなた達に叩きつけられる。","translatedEnglishLine":"Raw murderous intent is hurled towards you all."},{"lineNumber":206871,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔王がただそこにいるというだけで、","translatedEnglishLine":"Just the presence of the Demon King there,"},{"lineNumber":206872,"originalJapaneseLine":"あなたの肌を粟立ち、ビリビリと痺れる。","translatedEnglishLine":"makes your skin crawl and tingle sharply."},{"lineNumber":206873,"originalJapaneseLine":"「人間とは脆い……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Humans are fragile..."},{"lineNumber":206874,"originalJapaneseLine":"　少し遊んでやっただけで儚くも崩れる……」","translatedEnglishLine":"They break so easily, even with just a little play...\""},{"lineNumber":206875,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お前達は、せいぜい保てよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You all best hold out as long as you can.\""},{"lineNumber":206876,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔王の殺意を浴び、いつかのように、","translatedEnglishLine":"Basking in the Demon King’s murderous intent, just like before,"},{"lineNumber":206877,"originalJapaneseLine":"あなたの心臓はバクバクと鳴っていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"your heart pounded wildly."},{"lineNumber":206878,"originalJapaneseLine":"記憶によぎるのは以前の手痛い敗北の光景。","translatedEnglishLine":"What flashes through your memory is the painful scene of your previous defeat."},{"lineNumber":206879,"originalJapaneseLine":"それでも――","translatedEnglishLine":"Even so—"},{"lineNumber":206880,"originalJapaneseLine":"今のあなたには、かけがえのない仲間達がいた。","translatedEnglishLine":"now you had irreplaceable comrades with you."},{"lineNumber":206881,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おう！　行くぞ、＜エール＞！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yeah! Let’s go, <Yell>!\""},{"lineNumber":206882,"originalJapaneseLine":"「＜エール＞、ここまでの全てをぶつけよう」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"<Yell>, let’s throw everything we’ve got so far.\""},{"lineNumber":206883,"originalJapaneseLine":"「頑張ろうね、＜エール＞ちゃん！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Let’s do our best, <Yell>-chan!\""},{"lineNumber":206884,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うう、＜エール＞ちゃん！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Uh, <Yell>-chan!\""},{"lineNumber":206885,"originalJapaneseLine":"「＜エール＞！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"<Yell>!\""},{"lineNumber":206886,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ややや、やってやろうぜ！　","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yayayay, let’s do it! "},{"lineNumber":206887,"originalJapaneseLine":"＜エール＞！」","translatedEnglishLine":"<Yell>!\""},{"lineNumber":206888,"originalJapaneseLine":"あなたは頷く。","translatedEnglishLine":"You nod."},{"lineNumber":206889,"originalJapaneseLine":"「最後の確認だ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Final confirmation!\""},{"lineNumber":206890,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いいか、お前ら！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Listen up, you guys!"},{"lineNumber":206891,"originalJapaneseLine":"　魔王を倒そうなんて思うな！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Don’t think about defeating the Demon King!\""},{"lineNumber":206892,"originalJapaneseLine":"「負けないように慎重に戦い、チャンスを待つ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Fight carefully to avoid losing, and wait for the chance!"},{"lineNumber":206893,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そして隙が出来た時――」","translatedEnglishLine":"And when an opening appears—\""},{"lineNumber":206894,"originalJapaneseLine":"「リセット！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Reset!\""},{"lineNumber":206895,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うん、分かってる！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yeah, I understand!\""},{"lineNumber":206896,"originalJapaneseLine":"「私がお父さんをクラウゼンの手でビンタして、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I’ll slap Father back to sanity with Clausen’s hand,"},{"lineNumber":206897,"originalJapaneseLine":"　正気に戻す！」","translatedEnglishLine":"and bring him back to his senses!\""},{"lineNumber":206898,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うおおおおおおお！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Uooooooo!"},{"lineNumber":206899,"originalJapaneseLine":"　やったろーぜ！　＜エール＞！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Let’s do this! <Yell>!\""},{"lineNumber":206900,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":206901,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔王ランスがあなた達を見渡し、","translatedEnglishLine":"The Demon King Rance looked over all of you,"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王ランスは一度溜め息を吐きだし、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Demon King Rance sighed once,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 改めてあなた達に視線を向ける。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and turned his gaze back to you all.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「私の言葉に答えることを許す。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I will allow you to answer my words.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人間である貴様らが何故ここにいる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Why do you humans dare to be here?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今までのランスとは全く違う口調。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A tone completely different from Rance until now.
Could it be that the memories of being human..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 思ったよりもよっぽど、魔王化が進行している」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon king transformation is advancing much more than I thought."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ケッ、まずいことあるもんか」
「今日ここで、魔王とは決着をつけるだけだ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Today, here, we'll just settle things with the Demon King!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おう、そうだろう、＜エール＞！」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As expected of our little brother!"
As expected of our little sister!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うん……ありがとう、＜エール＞ちゃん」
「君はとっても優しい子だね……」
むき出しの殺意が、あなた達に叩きつけられる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Raw murderous intent is hurled towards you all.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王がただそこにいるというだけで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just the presence of the Demon King there,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたの肌を粟立ち、ビリビリと痺れる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: makes your skin crawl and tingle sharply.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少し遊んでやっただけで儚くも崩れる……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They break so easily, even with just a little play..."
"You all best hold out as long as you can."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王の殺意を浴び、いつかのように、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Basking in the Demon King’s murderous intent, just like before,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたの心臓はバクバクと鳴っていた。
記憶によぎるのは以前の手痛い敗北の光景。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What flashes through your memory is the painful scene of your previous defeat.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今のあなたには、かけがえのない仲間達がいた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: now you had irreplaceable comrades with you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「＜エール＞、ここまでの全てをぶつけよう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "<Yell>, let’s throw everything we’ve got so far."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王を倒そうなんて思うな！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Don’t think about defeating the Demon King!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「負けないように慎重に戦い、チャンスを待つ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Fight carefully to avoid losing, and wait for the chance!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「私がお父さんをクラウゼンの手でビンタして、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I’ll slap Father back to sanity with Clausen’s hand,
and bring him back to his senses!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王ランスがあなた達を見渡し、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Demon King Rance looked over all of you,

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
